Description: This posting is for a used 2016 PRS S2 Custom 24 Electric Guitar in a Beautiful Whale Blue Stain Finish with serial number #S2021418 in Mint, almost New Condition. It was bought Brand New and was only played for less than 3 hours. It features Maple Top, Mahogany Body and Neck, 24 Frets, 25" Scale Length, Pattern Regular Neck Shape, Rosewood Fretboard, Bird Inlay, PRS Tremolo Bridge, PRS Locking Tuners, 85/15 "S" Pickups. 1 Master Volume and Push/Pull Tone Controls with 3-Way Blade Pickup Switch, and Nickel Hardware. The neck is super straight, and frets is super clean with plenty of life left. All electronics are in great, new working condition without any scratchy noise or interference. Cosmetically, it is in Mint condition with no cracks, defects, or damages except may be a few light blemishes. This is a very light and beautiful designed guitar. It has a unique look with a great fast, amazing neck and great tones. This guitar will come with it's original manual, inspection card and a PRS Premium Padded Gigbag . Please see pictures for more details! Good luck and thank you! OVERVIEW: The S2 Custom 24 takes the original PRS guitar, the Custom 24, and re-imagines it with stripped-down features and a new aesthetic. Retaining the classic maple top/mahogany back combination with their classic body shape and a asymmetrical beveled top, this guitar is resonant with a funky familiarity. Its versatility comes from its 85/15 "S" pickups, push pull tone knob, and 3-way blade switch. Familiar for PRS players of old, and a fresh take for players of all types. Includes gig bag. PRS S2 Custom 24 Features: Maple Top with lightly FlamedMahogany Body Mahogany Neck24 Frets 25" Scale Length Pattern Regular Neck Shape Rosewood Fretboard Bird Inlays PRS Tremolo Bridge PRS Locking Tuners 85/15 "S" Pickups1 Master Volume and Push/Pull Tone Controls with 3-Way Blade Pickup SwitchNickel HardwarePRS Premium Padded Gigbag
Title: 2016 American PRS S2 Custom 24 Whale Blue Stain Electric Guitar (MINT)
